Module JBubbleBobble2
Package BubbleBobble.model

Class Hero

java.lang.Object
BubbleBobble.model.Collidable
BubbleBobble.model.Hero
public class Hero extends Collidable
The Hero class represents the main character of the game. The hero can move, shoot bubbles, collect fruit, and interact with monsters. The hero has a limited number of lives, and the game ends when the hero either completes the final level or runs out of lives. The class uses the Strategy Design Pattern to allow different behaviors for the hero depending on its current state.

  • Constructor Details

    • Hero

      public Hero(Level level, int x, int y, int width, int height)
      Constructs a Hero object with specified position, size, and initial lives. The hero starts with a default action strategy and a set of predefined sprites.
      Parameters:
      level - The level where the hero is located.
      x - The initial X-coordinate of the hero.
      y - The initial Y-coordinate of the hero.
      width - The width of the hero sprite.
      height - The height of the hero sprite.

  • Method Details

    • setActionStrategy

      public void setActionStrategy(HeroActionStrategy actionStrategy)
      Sets the action strategy for the hero, allowing different behaviors based on the hero's current state.
      Parameters:
      actionStrategy - The strategy to set for the hero's actions.

    • updatePosition

      public void updatePosition()
      Updates the position of the hero based on gravity and collision states. The hero's sprite direction is also updated based on the current movement direction.
      Specified by:
      updatePosition in class Collidable

    • addToList

      public void addToList()
      Adds the hero to the level's hero list (if not already added).
      Specified by:
      addToList in class Collidable

    • collideWithPlatform

      public void collideWithPlatform(Platform p)
      Handles collisions with platforms, adjusting the hero's position if necessary. This method is responsible for preventing the hero from passing through platforms.
      Overrides:
      collideWithPlatform in class Collidable
      Parameters:
      p - The platform with which the hero may collide.

    • changeSpriteDirection

      public void changeSpriteDirection()
      Changes the direction of the hero's sprite based on its current movement direction. The hero's sprite is updated to reflect either the left or right movement.

    • move

      public void move(String direction)
      Moves the hero in the specified direction. The action strategy determines the behavior of the movement.
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction in which to move the hero ("left", "right", etc.).

    • shootBubble

      public void shootBubble()
      Shoots a bubble from the hero. The behavior is determined by the hero's current action strategy.

    • shootFireBubble

      public void shootFireBubble(int type)
      Shoots a fire bubble from the hero. The behavior is determined by the hero's current action strategy. The type of fire bubble is passed as a parameter.
      Parameters:
      type - The type of fire bubble to shoot.

    • collideWithEnemy

      public void collideWithEnemy()
      Handles the collision between the hero and an enemy (e.g., Fireball, BubbleBuster, or Incendo). If the hero is not invincible, it loses a life, and the game pauses briefly. The hero respawns after a brief invincibility period.
